org.waarp.openr66.context.task

Class AbstractTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.context.task.AbstractTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExecTask, ChModTask, CopyRenameTask, CopyTask, DeleteTask, ExecJavaTask, FileCheckTask, FtpTransferTask, LinkRenameTask, LogTask, MoveRenameTask, MoveTask, RenameTask, RescheduleTransferTask, RestartServerTask, SnmpTask, TarTask, TranscodeTask, UnzeroedFileTask, ValidFilePathTask, ZipTask

    public abstract class AbstractTask
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Abstract implementation of task

      • getReplacedValue

        protected String getReplacedValue(String arg,
                                  Object[] argFormat)
        Parameters:
        arg - as the Format string where FIXED items will be replaced by context values and next using argFormat as format second argument; this arg comes from the rule itself
        argFormat - as format second argument; this argFormat comes from the transfer Information itself
        Returns:
        The string with replaced values from context and second argument
